_sText:
This is a middle east style map. Terrorists have to bomb the command center or the checkpoint. I worked on this for over a year and it has 90% custom content including models and texture set. It has a custom HDR sky as well. The nav file was done by chizbone so it's highly tweaked. Tools used to create this.

Hammer
Paintshop Pro 7
HDR Shop
Tree[d]
Khed
Softimage XSI
Vue 8

Enjoy!
